languages.text: "Если воины Алайтока не прибудут в эту часть галактики, сыны и дочери Крудараха сгинут среди миров мон-кай. Такой судьбы ты нам хочешь?"

traits.locale_text: "Если войны Алайтока не прибудут в эту часть галаклики, сыны и дочери Крудараха сгинут среди миров мон-кай. Такой судьбы ты нам хочешь?"

languages.text: "Unless the warriors of Alaitoc arrive in this part of the galaxy, the sons and daughters of Crudarach will perish among the worlds of the mon-keigh. Is that the fate you wish for us?"
languages.original_text: "Если воины Алайтока не прибудут в эту часть галактики, сыны и дочери Крудараха сгинут среди миров мон-кай. Такой судьбы ты нам хочешь?"

traits.locale_text: "Unless the warriors of Alaitoc arrive in this part of the galaxy, the sons and daughters of Crudarach are going to perish among the worlds of the mon-keigh. Is this the fate you wish for us?"
"Unless the warriors of Alaitoc arrive in this part of the galaxy, the sons and daughters of Crudarach are going to perish among the worlds of the mon-keigh. Is this the fate you wish for us?"
"Unless the warriors of Alaitoc arrive in this part of the galaxy, the sons and daughters of Crudarach are going to perish among the worlds of the mon-keigh. Is this the fate you wish for us?"
"Unless the warriors of Alaitoc arrive in this part of the galaxy, the sons and daughters of Crudarach are going to perish among the worlds of the mon-keigh. Is this the fate you wish for us?"
"Unless the warriors of Alaitoc arrive in this part of the galaxy, the sons and daughters of Crudarach will perish among the worlds of the mon-keigh. Is that the fate you wish for us?"
"Unless the warriors of Alaitoc arrive in this part of the galaxy, the sons and daughters of Crudarach will perish among the worlds of the mon-keigh. Is that the fate you wish for us?"

languages.text: «A menos que los guerreros de Alaitoc lleguen a esta parte de la galaxia, los hijos e hijas de Crudarach perecerán en los mundos de los mon-keigh. ¿Es ese el sino que deseas para nosotros?».
languages.original_text: "Unless the warriors of Alaitoc arrive in this part of the galaxy, the sons and daughters of Crudarach will perish among the worlds of the mon-keigh. Is that the fate you wish for us?"

traits.locale_text: «A menos que los guerreros de Alaitoc lleguen a esta parte de la galaxia, los hijos e hijas de Crudarach perecerán en los mundos de los mon-keigh. ¿Es ese el sino que deseas para nosotros?».

languages.text: “除非阿莱托克的战士们到达这片星区，否则克鲁达拉赫的子嗣必将在猴子的世界中灭亡。你真的希望我们落得这样的命运吗？”
languages.original_text: "Unless the warriors of Alaitoc arrive in this part of the galaxy, the sons and daughters of Crudarach will perish among the worlds of the mon-keigh. Is that the fate you wish for us?"

traits.locale_text: “除非阿莱托克的战士们到达这片星区，否则克鲁达拉赫的子嗣必将在猴子的世界中灭亡。你真的希望我们落得这样的命运吗？”

languages.text: « À moins que les guerriers d'Alaitoc ne viennent dans ce secteur de la galaxie, les enfants de Crudarach périront sur les mondes des mon-keigh. Souhaitez-vous vraiment que nos semblables connaissent un tel sort ? »
languages.original_text: "Unless the warriors of Alaitoc arrive in this part of the galaxy, the sons and daughters of Crudarach will perish among the worlds of the mon-keigh. Is that the fate you wish for us?"

traits.locale_text: « À moins que les guerriers d'Alaitoc ne viennent dans ce secteur de la galaxie, les enfants de Crudarach périront sur les mondes des mon-keigh. Souhaitez-vous vraiment que nos semblables connaissent un tel sort ? »

languages.text: 「アライトクの戦士たちがこの銀河に到着しない限り、クルダラの息子や娘たちはモン＝ケイの世界で滅びることになる。これがお前の望む運命なのか？」
languages.original_text: "Unless the warriors of Alaitoc arrive in this part of the galaxy, the sons and daughters of Crudarach will perish among the worlds of the mon-keigh. Is that the fate you wish for us?"

traits.locale_text: 「アライトクの戦士たちがこの銀河に到着しない限り、クルダラの息子や娘たちはモン＝ケイの世界で滅びることになる。これがお前の望む運命なのか？」

languages.text: "Wenn die Krieger von Alaitoc nicht in diesen Teil der Galaxie kommen, werden die Söhne und Töchter von Crudarach zwischen den Welten der Chem-Pan-Sey sterben. Ist das denn das Schicksal, das Ihr Euch für uns wünscht?"
languages.original_text: "Unless the warriors of Alaitoc arrive in this part of the galaxy, the sons and daughters of Crudarach will perish among the worlds of the mon-keigh. Is that the fate you wish for us?"

traits.locale_text: "Wenn die Krieger von Alaitoc nicht in diesen Teil der Galaxie kommen, werden die Söhne und Töchter von Crudarach zwischen den Welten der Chem-Pan-Sey sterben. Ist das denn das Schicksal, das Ihr Euch für uns wünscht?"

languages.text: "Alaitoc savaşçıları galaksinin bu bölgesine gelmediği sürece Crudarach'ın oğullarıyla kızları, mon-keigh dünyalarının arasında yok olacak. Bizim için arzuladığın kader bu mu?"
languages.original_text: "Unless the warriors of Alaitoc arrive in this part of the galaxy, the sons and daughters of Crudarach will perish among the worlds of the mon-keigh. Is that the fate you wish for us?"

traits.locale_text: "Alaitoc savaşçıları galaksinin bu bölgesine gelmediği sürece Crudarach'ın oğullarıyla kızları, mon-keigh dünyalarının arasında yok olacak. Bizim için arzuladığın kader bu mu?"
